body.name: siaviala Laptop Screen Extender,14" IPS Triple Monitor for Laptop Extension- FHD 1080P Travel Portable Monitor Screen for 13"-17.3" Laptops HDMI/USB-A/Type-C Plug & Play for Wins/Mac/Chrome/Switch
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 12 mins
features: ➤【Improve Efficiency 300% & Convenient Work & Save Time】-Our 14” Triple Monitor for Laptop Screen with 2 extra screens support you open multiple tasks at the same time and improve your work efficiency up to 300%!Laptop Screen Extender can extend or mirror laptop content help you no need switch workspace save lot time.Carry it with you to start enjoy your travels ,remote work, video conference ,gaming etc (Applicable for 13-17.3 IN Laptops).

➤【Widely applicable & Plug and Play No Need Driver】-The Portable Triple Monitor for Laptop compatible most Windows,Mac OS,Linux,Intel ,Chrome,Switch,PS4/5,Xbox One (Suit Mac M1 Pro/Max , M2 Pro/Max, M3 Pro/Max chip laptop,Not suit M1/ M2 /M3 chip laptop) . Please make sure your laptop has 2 USB-C ports or 1 USB-C + 1 HDMI port or 2 HDMI port. Tips:Some laptops USB-C port is not full function (only support power or video transmission),Please check before use.

➤【Multiple Use Mode & Extend Mirror Landscape Portrait】 -The Portable Triple Monitor for Laptop Screen can be set as extend/ mirror/Landscape/portrait ,Each Laptop Monitor can be independently connect and adjust (brightness, volume, font size,etc),turn On/OFF. Each screen of this laptop monitor extender supports 0-180°rotation, making it easy to share the screen with your colleagues and friends in all directions in a more simple way.

➤【1920x1080P FHD IPS Monitor & Support Independently Adjust 】-14" Full IPS 1080P Laptop Monitor Extension is portable and light easy to take out even in travel. Configured with 178°clear view angle / 300 nit brightness / 72% NTSC gamut / 1:1000 ratio, provide a bright vivid & immersive visual experience.Each monitor design with button can independently turn On/OFF & adjust (brightness, volume, font size etc).

➤【Package & Service】-Siaviala provide all accessories for using the Dual Monitor Extender for laptop (Monitor Screen S2 *1, USB-C to C cable *2, USB-A to C cable *2, HDMI to C cable *2, Premium Leather Bag*1). USB-C to C (support power & video) / USB-A to C (power only) / HDMI to C (video only).High-quality materials with 100% QC Attachable Laptop Monitors Screen,Please message us if you need any help , We will reply you in 24H.

Quick Guide: Q1: How to check Tpye-C port on computer is an all-function port or not ? A: If your laptop have a USB-C port with one of the following symbols (or the Thunderbolt 3, Thunderbolt 4, DP 1.2), then it is the Full-function Type-C port, you can use the USB C to C cable to connect each monitor screen. (You also can check the manual or go online to check the computer port parameters.) Q2: Monitor screen display show "No Signal" A: 1>If you use USB-C to C connect, it means your computer's C port only support power not support video transmission,You can connect a extra HDMI to C cable (Offer video transmission). 2>If you use HDMI to C cable (Offer video transmission) & USB-A/C to C cable (Offer power). It means that your laptop can't provide 5V/2A power through the USB Type-C port, you need connect an external 5V/2A adapter to power the monitor screen. Q3: Monitor Screen Flickers & Black Screen A:It may be that your laptop is low battery or voltage is insufficient,use an external 5V/2A adapter to power laptop or monitor screen extender. Q4: Monitor screen not light up after connecting? A:It may be that your laptop does not have enough power. Please charge the monitor with an extra 5V/2A adapter.And also please active your laptop screen to avoid extender screen into sleep mode. --------------------------------------------------- Connection Guide： Our package with many cables USB-C to C *2 / USB-A to C *2 / HDMI to C *2 ,Enough for 2 monitor screens use, no matter what port in your laptop computer . Method 1: If your laptop has 2 USB-C ports (Full-Funtion port)： Just need connect USB-C to C cable (Offer video transmission & power)to each monitor screen, Make sure USB-C cable can deliver 5V/2A power. Method 2: If your laptop has 1 USB-C ,1 HDMI & 1 USB-A port： You can connect one monitor screen with USB-C to C cable, and the other monitor screen with HDMI to C cable(Offer video transmission )& USB-A to C cable (Offer power). Method 3: If your laptop has 1 HDMI Ports and many USB-A port: You can connect one monitor screen with HDMI cables (Offer video transmission )& USB-A to C (Offer power).The other monitor screen need a extra 1 hud cable (USB-A to HDMI) & HDMI to C cable (Offer video transmission )and USB-A to C cable (Offer power)
